columns.name: ip_count
columns.description: Number of IP addresses used during the session.

columns.name: main_ip
columns.description: Most commonly used IP address during the session (or one of the most commonly used in case of a tie).

columns.name: user_count
columns.description: Number of user IDs used during the session.

columns.name: main_user
columns.description: Most commonly used user ID during the session (or one of the most commonly used in case of a tie)

columns.name: video_count
columns.description: Number of unique videos interacted with during the session.

columns.name: main_video
columns.description: Most commonly viewed video during the session (or one of the most commonly used in case of a tie)

columns.name: event_count
columns.description: Number of unique events interacted with during the session.

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: Timestamp of the first request in the session.

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: Timestamp of the last request in the session.

columns.name: duration
columns.description: Length of the session, in milliseconds.
